short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn new vocabulary words in different contexts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn new vocabulary words in different contexts.

It is proved that learning words in context ensures better results in extending one's vocabulary(e.g. https://files.eric.ed.gov/fulltext/EJ815123.pdf), thus 1000 Words chrome extension is here to enable learning new words by placing them in different contexts.

1000 Words allows you to choose a new word you want to learn, and get short learning texts to extend a vocabulary.
Step 1. Choose a new word you want to learn.
Step 2. Get study texts in different contexts.
Step 3. Get back frequently to your word list to repeat.
Step 4. Remove words you remembered, and get back to step 1.

Learn new vocabulary words every day.
